content.detailedDescription: it was storming to the north of my house.  a lot of lighting.  my wife looked out our front room window and saw the blue-green light in the sky. it was about the size of a large star but there was too many clouds out to see any stars.   it didn't move at all in about 20 minutes.  i called a neighbor and she saw it too.  i called a friend in the northern part of the county to see if he could see it but it vanished before he got outside.  it was amazing how bright it was.  it looked like it might have been far away.  i had no reference to size it by for distance.
content.summary: A blue-green round light seen stationary in the sky for 20 minutes when observed

content.detailedDescription: My finance and i were leaving to go hunting at four in the morning,loading up the truck,when i looked into the early morning sky. looking for cloud cover. there was not a cloud in the sky.I noticed a particularly bright star,then the star moved in a zigzag pattern. suddenly there was a second light that moved in perfect sync and distance. i called to my fiance to hurry and come see this. i showed him the "dancing lights ". he said, "those are ufo's". he said what i was thinking to myself. my heart was racing. the lights were flashing yellow.,then orange then green. they changed continuously,then they blinked off and on four times. then went back to original flashes. i told my fiance that those are no landing lights i had ever seen. we observed the lights for several minutes, he attempted to video them with his phone. i was excited and terrified at the same time. after we started driving we could still see them hovering for a few miles, then lost track of them in the trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed two separate lights in unison hovering, then zigzag in perfect sync and distance several times then hover. this happened over 1/2 hour.

content.detailedDescription: During a smoke break, i was trying out the slow motion video on my camera. i decided to film the rain mist falling down from the sky and when i went back to look at the slow motion video, there was an object in it. i didn't see anything with the naked eye, only after looking at the video later, did i see it. i would have wrote it off as a fluke, but the rain falls in front of it, and smoke drifts in front of it as well. in addition, i took 2 slow motion videos in succession and the second video does not contain the object.
content.summary: Oval nearing square, transparent outline, blue glow appears to be interior emission

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house.. this is no the first time that i saw this.. i was looking at the sky i always do that.. then i look at the north side of the sky and i saw something like a star but it was diferent.. then like 2 mins later this thing start to came at my direction it was a triangular ship with a birght light without sound.. i saw this object 2 times in the same place but this time fly above my house like 10ms from where i was and i saw it... the object slowed his speed when pass like infront of me .. then continue with his road to the south and desappear.... i know this kind of ships take ppl to mars...
content.summary: Like those ships they use to take ppl to mars

content.detailedDescription: Just received a new laser pointer for star pointing, i wanted to see how strong it would be so before sun went down all the way i tested laser pointing a a low (white) cloud seconds after pointing at cloud a object slowly moved out of cloud grew lighter (brighter) in appearance in a pulsing manner, slowly moved in straight line for about 30-45 seconds then faded to same as the sky in background. this is the 4th time i have seen such objects 3 in daylight and on at night all being very low others vanished over tree tops this one faded out seemingly in increments. no storms in or near area. some clouds in area, like white cotton.
content.summary: Using new laser (for astro) pointed to low white cloud to test

content.detailedDescription:
It was a sunny afternoon. i was driving on old westminster pike from westminster, md towards finksburg, md. i'm not sure exactly when i noticed a gray/silver oval object in the sky off to the left. i've seen it at least 2 times before while driving on this same road but couldn't determine where it went those previous times. 

i kept driving trying to see it. when i got below bethel road, there was a big cornfield to the left where the corn had been cut so i had better line of sight. i pulled over just to observe what was going on. there were 2 gray/silver oval objects in the sky. they didn't appear to be moving, just staying right there. a flock of black birds flew up over md route 140 which runs parallel to the corn field. from that, it was clear that the objects were farther away than i first thought. (i'm terrible with distance.) 

i drove down old westminster pike and turned left at green mill road. the next intersection is md 140 and suffolk road. on suffolk road, there is an at&t building, which is also nsa. (this is public knowledge, as the baltimore sun printed this news about 15 or 20 years ago.) to be honest, i thought maybe these objects had something to do with nsa. i drove past the nsa building. on the same side of the road there is a field just beyond the fenced in nsa property. i pulled over. the 2 objects were still there, not moving. i am terrible with distance but maybe they were over upperco at rt 91/emory road, which is to the southeast. 

maybe they were balloons of some type? i don't know.
content.summary: I first saw one object in sky and as i drove, i saw 1 more.

content.city: In an airplane going to s
content.detailedDescription: On plane coming from maui left at night going to seattle; probably saw it right at dawn.  the event did not take place in la, ca, but hard to know when we are in an airplane.  my daughter in window seat saw it first, let me know and i saw a smoke trail with a red light then the light went out.  she first took a pic and then took video.  when the object turns there are no wings and my husband said it's probably a missle?  we were going 500 mph at 6 to 6.5 miles up in the air.  her pic and video is attached, i couldn't get video turned.
content.summary: In plane at 35,000 feet from maui to seattle, daughter saw it first showed me took pic then video
content.locationName: In an airplane going to s, California

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9.35pm october 22nd 2015 i heard my girlfriend calling me urgently from upstairs in our home. i went up to meet her standing on the balcony of the top floor bedroom looking out and up into the night sky. she pointed off to the south below the bright moon that was there then gestured
somewhere into the usual los angeles atmospheric murk that obscures most stars e.T.C and said "look ..Up there..Keep watching...Something is blinking...Then it will suddenly flash somewhere just below it like a camera flash after the 'other' thing blinks!"
she seems disturbed by whatever it was she was seeing. i followed her hands direction and peered into the night sky. within less than a minute i also observed what she was describing.At about an angle of 35 degrees or so off the horizon..Halfway between the moon's height in the sky and the hollywood hills barely visible to the south...And just left of the moon as viewed from our vantage point...There was a sudden 'twinkling' of light. this i would describe as lasting perhaps a second or more and at first i took to be an aircraft's navigational lights. upon further observation (later as it repeated this same action) i noticed the light/lights were not moving. the light/lights seemed very far off and high.Barely visible next to the nearest bright star it also appeared to be a tiny 'cluster' of lights and to me had various colors in those tiny lights ranging from reds to blue's and white...Possibly more.There seemed to be a 'set pattern' to the blinks as it occurred once again leading me to suspect it was an aircraft.It still did not move. the light'lights would then just as suddenly disappear.Then after these lights would twinkle...Just as my girlfriend predicted, the other sudden 'flash' of light (possibly 5-10 degrees lower in the sky and somewhat close to the original object) would occur. it's light was exactly as described...A sudden bright white flash brighter than any of the brightest stars (much so) and oddly like a 'star filter' was being used as per movies often use. it also lasted momentarily longer than a camera flash. this 'twinkle..Then flash' repeated itself perhaps three times while i observed it and perhaps the same when my girlfriend observed it. this lasted possibly 15 minutes or so in total then no more...We thought we could barley see the 'twinkle' cluster for an amount of time after but then lost it completely..After another 10 minutes or more and went back inside.
it did not appear to move position the whole time.
i pondered later whether it truly was just a staionary arcraft of some sort but could not fathom what the accompanying much lower 'flash' light might have been.
content.summary: random flashing (colored) star 'cluster' with lower (in sky) accompanying intermittent sudden bright white flash (starlike). flashing 'star' very bright!

content.detailedDescription:
My first sighting occurred at 2015 pm mst on october 22 2015. while heading westbound on interstate 84 near mile marker 175 near jerome idaho.

 i seen several lights slowly appear toward the west/southwest part of the sky for a period lasting of 5-15 seconds per interval the ligts were a yellow to orange (candle flame) in color and would glow to a very bright (star like) figure then fade out to nothing.  

this first set of lights had a spacing of approximately 1/4 mile apart and were grouped up in an (l) like cluster. 

at 2025 pm mst approximately 5 to 10 miles south of exit 165 on interstate 84 the lights reappeared in the south and showed themselves two more times for about the same duration.

 about five minutes later at 2030 pm  mst the lights appeared again , this time in the southwest making a line with four separate lights stretching from north to south and approximately 1-3 miles apart and they appeared to be at different altitudes as they were or looked staggered. 

 my final sighting occurred at 2040 pm mst at mile marker 147 on interstate 84, this time the lights were due way to the south about ten miles or more but only two were appeared and they were very close to each other. the last i seen of these lights was an upward right hand movement of nearly 45 degrees at a fairly rapid rate of speed as they faded out to darkness. 

after this , there wasn't anything else to be seen from my vehicle the rest of the way to boise idaho. 

all i can say is, whatever it was, or whatever they were, i don't think it was from around here or of earthly origin!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellow to orange lights hovering in random locations and fading in and out of view.

content.detailedDescription: I was ridding my bike, when suddently i saw an shadow coming at me at great speed from my left, it crashed into the bike and i hit the floor, it stayed on the ground looking at me for a few seconds, the he start running again and disapear, it is very difficult to tell how it look but it is something like a tiny human, very tiny, max 50cm, it have ape traces, like the skin, baby like legs, very tiny in relation with the rest of the body, it was like an baby human ape.
content.summary: It looked like an tiny human with ape traces, her face as unique, dont know how to describe better

content.detailedDescription: I wasn't angina on the deck outside listening to my fiancés drunken rant, while looking up at the stars i noticed a light moving to fast to be a plane and it wasn't ur normal plain lights. so i pulled out my phone and started videoing the event, i was extremely excited because i'd had hoped to see and video a ufo event for my self some time in my life.
content.summary: Lights moving from ne-nw up and down fast almost like time laps speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving sandwich in kent on a november evening in 1977 at observed the hovering triangle for 10 minutes until i reach ash. i stopped the car and got out. i stood on the tp of a small hill for a further 5 minutes. it was a clear sky, no clouds and the triangle was black and solid. it was about 1,000 ft high. we had a power station close by, so i was able to assess its height. it had 9 lights as if there were three triangles of 3 lights making one object of 9 lights. i could not see the starts through the object, so knew that it was solid. without any sound it shot off over the horizon and was gone in 10 seconds. that calculates at 9,000 mph because from the top of that hill, one can see france and over the horizon.

i got home and my father came in. he had stood underneath it and confirmed there was sound.

we just did not know what to make of it.

it was at least twice the size of a jumbo jet and hovered silently for at least 15 minutes be disappearing over the horizon to france.
content.summary: Triangle with 9 lights looked like three triangles making one triangle. twice the size of  a jumbo jet. silent disappeared over the sea(horizon) in less than 10 seconds. est speed at 9,000 mph because of time and distance

content.detailedDescription: This morning i was driving north on route 29 towards columbia. i was past the icc. i saw a metallic silver object and thought it was too big to be a balloon. i kept looking at it, it didn’t make noise. it was a triangular shape but if it turned, it looked like a different shape. there were 3 big red lights on the bottom of it. i tried to look at it as long as i could but the stoplight turned green and i had to keep driving. it wasn’t being chased, it was just moving southbound fairly slowly. it moved very smoothly. enough for me to have been looking at it during the red stoplight and not lost it from sight. it was a clear morning so i know it wasn’t anything else. and i know what a plane shape is like but this didn’t have any wings jutting out or a tail. it was just a smooth metallic triangle with lights on the bottom. i wasn't afraid, felt pretty calm, intrigued when looking at the object. i was interested to see if it would disappear or if i'd notice it looked like a plane or helicopter but the entire time it stayed the same triangular shape with the three red lights continuously on.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft with 3 red lights underneath

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was stood on my back doorstep looking at the clear night sky suddenly a bright flame like ball appeared in my site. i thought it was a chinese lantern as it flickered but it did not move in any direction. i could not tell how high or far it was due to the dark night sky. after 10 minutes or so it was still in the same position. suddenly the light seemed to shoot of in a straight line eastwards leaving a faint trail and going to a tiny dot that seemed in the distance. before it disapeared i rang the police to report what i had seen to check if there had been a plane crash or other sightings. i was quite concerned about the nature of the very fast movement away and told friend within minutes. they thought i was being stupid but i was still concerned about it. several days later my friend said he thought it may have been a meteor. i accepted that but the actions of it were not like a meteor or comet as i know.
content.summary: Hovering bright light for several minutes then shot across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Orb appered after photo was taken of the moon

contact for more details.

thanks
content.summary: Orb appeared in photo of the last blood moon

content.detailedDescription: Saw a white blinking object, with red lights . it moved stright line, no noise. same as i have seen in the past.
content.summary: Looked out front window saw a white, object with red and white flashing. seemed to rotate.

content.detailedDescription:
I have house dogs who ask to be taken out. at 4:52am, as i opened my front door and started to step onto the porch, with the leash in my hand, i immediately saw an object flying very low in the sky coming towards us. i first remember thinking that it was a plane flying very very low, until i saw the pattern of  bright white lights at the bottom: a row of 2 or 3 and just above that another, a bit longer row of lights, maybe 6 or 7. on the belly of the object. i also realized that it was not making noise as a plane would, even a plane flying low beginning to land. it was a barely audible pulsating hum. it was also approaching faster than a plane flying that low would be, faster than a plane flying overhead in a landing pattern would be, but slow enough to give me time to really look at it.

i'm a retired investigator and it's natural for me to immediately take in details quickly, to notice things and that instinct kicked in, even though i'd realized what this could be, even though i was standing there, totally in awe. and - the fact that i have a partially photographic memory helped too.

as i reached the end of the porch, still looking up, our solar powered motion sensor light came on behind us, illuminating me from the back. about a second later, the object, which was nearly overhead and which i could almost see the outlines of, suddenly slowed down, almost stopping, hesitated, it looked like it may have wobbled - and i remember thinking it was almost as if it - whoever was flying it, saw the porch-light come on and saw me standing there, illuminated by it, mesmerized. there are not many lights on that early in our neighborhood, our porch-light is a very bright white light and would stand out, and they were flying low enough i guess it was possible that whoever it was did see me.

after hesitating for a moment, the object made a slight turn, still nw but more to the west and it completed the turn much more quickly than a plane would have. also, by this time, i could see more of an outline of the object and could see it was definitely not a plane - it was much much shorter in length and width. the white lights which i'd noticed initially were located at the on the bottom of the object - on its "belly" 

there is a gas station about a block away towards the northwest, which has so many lights so bright a plane could land, and as it made the slight turn, it was almost directly overhead and i could see more of the outline and it looked as if it were either a light color, or was made of some reflective material that was reflecting the bright lights of the gas station, or possibly illuminated by lights on tops of it i could not see, if it was actually glowing faintly - and i could see it was definitely not a plane. there was no wings, no tail. it looked almost "shuttle like", not as in our space shuttle. more of a wedge shape - but definitely not flat - it looked as if the objects height may have been about 1/3 of the body length. i could not see if there were windows. 

after it passed, i saw the back, and there were 3 pale orange/yellow, glowing and much much larger round lights, in a triangular shape, they actually looked more like the bottom of a rocket (where there are emissions) - but there were none - instead, they glowed. it definitely looked as if whatever it was was being propelled by whatever those orange lights were, like they were a form of propulsion - only with no emission. 

as it approached the trees in the distance, it looked as if it may have shifted direction again, still northwest, but more north than northwest. then, once it passed the trees it was out of my line of sight. 

that was, amazingly.......Cool! i have experienced sightings before, before this just happened, over 30 years ago, several friends and i sitting on a bluff overlooking peoria near midnight watched in awe as what was obviously a fairly sizable flying object, both hovered and darted about in the sky. that object had a dark outline and had many lights, but because it was a distance away, it was just a bit bigger than a dime in our line of vision. we watched it for a good 5 minutes, and it suddenly zipped away. before this, that was my best experience. this object was just a bit bigger than a golf ball in my line of vision as it passed overhead.  this......Was awesome! and that's how i was feeling as it hesitated as they saw me standing there, heck, i wanted to invite them in for coffee! 

i do not carry my phone outside with me when i take the dogs out - am afraid they will suddenly dart towards a critter and with me holding the leash, would drop my phone, but i am regretting not having it with me - i could have taken quite a few pictures at the speed in which it was traveling. i am going to find a way to carry it with me from now on....
content.summary: Humming object with lights flew low in sky almost over my head

content.detailedDescription:
1.  driving from raleigh, nc to greenville, nc about 33 minutes outside greenville on 264 east.  roughly 2:40 this morning (10/23/2015)
2.  i first noticed two or three shooting stars. one of which was very, very fast and much larger than the first.
3. it seemed to be a plane but was moving much too slow.  continued to slowly move to the left side of the sky.
4.  it has continuous blinking white, red, and green lights which flashed at different intervals.  it was the lowest, and brightest thing in the sky.
5.  i wanted to look up if there were meteor showers this morning.  but couldn't find any information online.  i considered it to be a plane or a star, but there was something odd about it.  i had a strange feeling the people in the car ahead of me were looking at it too.  i had the urge to pull my car over and look at it longer.  it was hypnotique, as if something was sending a message.  
6.  i was driving and could no longer see it.  i watched the star for at least ten minutes heading east on 264 towards greenville.
content.summary: Red/green/white flashing star-like object moved slowly to the left side of sky, lowest object in sky

content.detailedDescription: While working on oil rig, my driller called me over to witness the event with him and two other people. 3 extremely bright objects, one would brighten, then the other would show up and brighten, then the third would brighten but much dimmer than the other two. one would dim out, then the other two would immediately dim out. this happened for approximately 20 minutes. video was recorded. i will upload the  video once i get off of work. it is still happening as i type this.
content.summary: 3 pulsating lights,

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on my lunch break sitting at the beach looking at the sky. i first noticed the object as it lit up and just appeared with out any warning. i first though it was one of the brighter stars, but the size was just way to big to be a star. i watched it sit there for about 5 min. it moved a little to the right then a little to the left, after which it stopped and then moved away from me.As it was flying over the water the light went dark in less then 1 seconed.I felt some what calm, and excited at the same time. i felt a little confused being this is my 3rd time seeing something so bizarre.I looked for some co works to get their attention but no one was around me. i tried to get my phone so i could record it but i could not get the camera to come up fast enough on my phone. the object went in the eastern direction, the light was about the size of my pinky nail with my arm extended outward,within one to one and one half sec the light was dim then gone.
content.summary: Brightest light appeared below clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at night and i heard this noise that just got louder and louder until i was holding my ears and looking around for the noise i looked up and noticed a black rectangle about the size of a 40ft container moving slowly through the sky at about tree top height i kept watching it just slowly fly of into the distance i really do believe there are unanswered questions in the world i still think about that event 6 mths after it happened
content.summary: I was at work and heard a low humming noise that got louder and louder until my ears hurt i was looking around for sound and looked up and saw a black rectangle moving through the sky at about 200 feet

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving work in walnut creek car when couple off my coworkers where staring at the sky and then i seen it it was 2 ufo cilender shape objects flying really fast one tilted the craft which gave a shadow on it then they where gone
content.summary: 2 ufo where seen going across the sky really fast then disappeared in minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car around 9:30pm near amesville,oh which is right outside of athens,oh, while driving i noticed what i thought was a star at first but it was way bigger than normal & not high enough to be a star & it was like a bright orange ball so i stopped my car to get a better look. about 8 seconds later it started pulsating orange & blue lights & then the object took off at a very high rate of speed across the sky & then shot straight up into the air until i lost sight of it. after the object ascended straight up i started driving in the direction in which the object flew away & i saw no other lights or crafts of any kind. i was in the u.S army and served in iraq i've seen numerous types of aircraft & this was absolutely not any of those!!! i have never seen anything like this in my life! i was actually shaking after the sighting i think maybe from my adrenaline pumping from seeing something i thought i would never see in my lifetime!! the entire sighting only lasted about 15 seconds at the most but it was long enough to understand what i'd just seen!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Circular shape object with constant orange light while hovering & then started changing color from orange to blue & then flew away at a very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I just saw a strange object in the sky over head in orange county, ca at 7:45pm p.T. oct.22 2015. taking out the trash and looked up at the stars. i saw a large dark gray triangular looking object heading around 230deg. west/sw. the object had 3 very dim circular lights at the corners staying continuously lit. seemed like it was flying around 1,000-3000 feet over head, and moving much faster than the multiple commercial and private aircraft in the area, but no noise at all. i thought, at first because it was so low, it was a police helicopter that didn't have the flashing colored running lights on like the police copters do sometimes. but it appeared to be to big and silent. then the dim lights quickly shifted as 2 more lights appeared, while all keeping in the same direction and speed! i was amazed as it went out of sight behind a house and trees. i only saw it for about 6-8 seconds, it was not easy to see, almost blurry and silent. i would like to remain anonymous, and reporting for investigative purposes.
content.summary: Saw traingular shaped grey object with light at the corners overhead. the lights multiplied and changed pattern , while keeping constant fast speed and direction. no sounds and low to ground

content.detailedDescription:
My step-father had stepped outside to smoke a cigarette, we where talking, it was approximately 12-1am, we heard a buzz/humming sound coming from behind the house, we turned around and above the tree line that sits approximately 85yrds from the house there was a "ufo", we never took our eyes off the object and i kept asking what is that?!?! he had no answer, we watched as the object slowly began to fall behind the trees until it was out of sight, the object was oval or egg shaped, had a yellow/red glow to it, it was all lit up, it kinda looked like the inside of a lava lamp... it was truly breathtaking and to this day we have no answers for what we saw... i forgot to mention just behind the trees there's a small pond... 
i sat outside that night after my step dad had went inside for another hour and a half and the object never re appeared... if you or anyone you know has any type of answer or have had a similar sighting please contact me... i sound crazy but i know what i saw was either not from this world or is an aircraft built by the government... thank you and one day we may know the truth...
content.summary: Hovered then slowly ascended into water

content.detailedDescription: All of a sudden a very bright light flashed in the sky. the light went out and then came back. it stayed roughly in the same area not moving to far from it's original point. the light was very intense. it would dim down to the point that i wasn't sure it was still there, and then come back. it did this for about 10 minutes. an airliner flying east to west was flying towards it. it dimed down and accelerated to the south as the plane approached. that was the last i seen of it. it's acceleration was very fast.
content.summary: Bright light. fast acceleration,

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking on the phone with a friend after the end of a long day at work (i somehow feel compelled to say that no alcohol or drugs were consumed, and that i have 20-20 vision). i was stargazing in my hammock in the yard, when i was distracted by a roar from above. then in plain view,  faster than fathomable, an egg shaped glowing white/platinum/silver/graphite object jetted eastward and disappeared. i have witnessed "shooting stars" even in central park before, but this was a very different experience; primarily due to the noise accompanying this sighting and the visible object blazing through the night sky. the sighting lasted all of 3 seconds, given my limited view of the sky amid tall buildings.

if anyone else witnessed this, or knows of meteorological phenomenon the night of 10/23 i would really appreciate knowing. wishing i had more facts. i am left electrified and in wonder.
content.summary: A luminescent, glowing, unbelievably bright, sonically roaring object, moving at startling speed. assuming an altitude of 10,000 ft, i estimate it’s speed to be near 2,000 mph. sadly, without facts about altitude, it isn't possible to factually state size

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car to go see my mother and my mother can running out of her house becuse she was in the back yard and show it ufo and it was flying over the house at about less the 250 feet whit out or very low humm. there was no marks or windows or lights on the ufo.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription: I was in the walmart parking lot of lake geneva just listening to music and looking through my sunroof at the stars waiting for a friend of mine to send me his address when 6 objects with 1 steady white light on each flew through my field of vision causing me to get out of the car to keep following them.1 of the aircraft were slightly further left of the group of 5 aircraft  a few of the objects in the group of 5 were shuffling in and out of formation. then they suddenly disappeared from view.
content.summary: 5 flying objects flying in a straight line east with 1 slightly farther away on the left side of that group. few of group of 5 shuffling in and out of formation

content.detailedDescription: I wasn't at this event, it was a parade that my daughter was in.  my daughter is not on this float.  another pageant mom took these photos and this showed up once the pics were uploaded.  she states she didn't photoshop anything.  i am not sure how this could have happened.  she is a mom - not looking for ufo's but looking to capture memories.  looks super weird to me - maybe this can happen on phone pics but it certainly hasn't happened on any of my photos....Ever!
content.summary: This pic is from a parade my daughter was in - the float is not the one she was on but it was one another girl was on from a different city.  there are several pics like this.  not sure if it was her camera or not but most of her photos have this in it.
